src.stt.analyze_data module¶

Description:

Creating a PDF report about the features of the dataset

Usage:

$ python src/data/analyze_data.py

src.stt.analyze_data.create_charts(df: DataFrame, col_use: str, title: str, xlabel: str, ylabel: str, hist: bool, file_name: str) → None¶

Create charts to visualize the difference between the train, val and test

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe to use

  • col_use (str) – Column to visualize

  • title (str) – Title of the chart

  • xlabel (str) – X label of the chart

  • ylabel (str) – Y label of the chart

  • hist (bool) – Flag to indicate if the chart is a histogram

  • file_name (str) – Name of the file to save

src.stt.analyze_data.create_dir(file_path: str) → None¶

Create the directory if it does not exist

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the directory

src.stt.analyze_data.evaluate_audio_sample(row: Series) → None¶

Evaluate the audio sample

Parameters:

row (pd.Series) – Row of the dataframe

src.stt.analyze_data.get_librosa_features(row: Series) → tuple[numpy.ndarray, int, float]¶

Get the duration of a wav file

Parameters:

row (pd.Series) – Row of the dataframe

Returns:

Audio array list, sample rate and duration of the wav file

Return type:

tuple[np.ndarray, int, float]

src.stt.analyze_data.load_dataframe(filename: str, columns: list[str]) → DataFrame¶

Load the dataframe from the csv file

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – Name of the csv file

  • columns (list[str]) – List of columns to load

Returns:

Dataframe with the loaded data

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.stt.analyze_data.load_train_val_test_data(folder_path: str) → DataFrame¶

Load the train, validation and test data

Parameters:

folder_path (str) – Path to the folder with the train, validation and test data

Returns:

Dataframe with the concatenated train, validation and test data

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.stt.analyze_data.main() → None¶

Main function

src.stt.analyze_data.make_report(df: DataFrame) → ProfileReport¶

Create a report of the dataframe with pandas profiling

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe to create the report for

Returns:

Report of the dataframe

Return type:

ProfileReport

src.stt.analyze_data.save_report(report: ProfileReport, file_path: str) → None¶

Save the report to the file path as an html file

Parameters:

  • report (ProfileReport) – Report to save

  • file_path (str) – Path to save the report to

Transform the dataframe

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe to transform

Transformed dataframe
